div.p: Inscrivez-vous sur la meilleure plateforme de vente d'équipements médicaux.

input.name: password
input.t-attf-class: form-control #{'form-control-sm' if form_small else ''} password secupass border-0

input.name: confirm_password
input.t-attf-class: form-control #{'form-control-sm' if form_small else ''} password-confirm border-0

div.p: Veuillez entrer vos identifiants pour vous connecter.

input.name: password
input.t-attf-class: form-control #{'form-control-sm' if form_small else ''} password border-0

div.t-attf-class: clearfix oe_login_buttons text-center gap-1 d-grid mb-1 {{'pt-2' if form_small else 'pt-3'}}
clearfix oe_login_buttons text-center gap-1 d-grid mb-1 pt-2

input.name: login
input.t-attf-class: form-control #{'form-control-sm' if form_small else ''} login border-0

input.t-attf-class: form-control #{'form-control-sm' if form_small else ''} password secupass border-0
